subject: NATIONAL BANK OF NEW YORK.
body:
NATIONAL BANK OF NEW YORK.
FOREIGN REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.
 Dear Beneficiary,
Following the agreement reached by U.S President Joe Biden and the Presidents/Heads of States of other countries, The government of United States of America and other world Presidents through the office of the U.S DEPARTMENT OF STATE has granted express receipt to all beneficiaries of Funds having been recovered to receive their payments being delayed or denied by various authorities and countries. Your expected Revenue according to available information in our file and the amount recovered in your name is $10.5M (Ten Million, Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) only, representing the amount unpaid to you from your Compensation/Inheritance funds As a matter of urgency, please provide us all the listed information below to enable us proceed with the transfer of your Compensation/Inheritance funds into your bank account without any delay.
(1) Your Full Names  
(2) Your Contact Address
(3) Your Contact Phone numbers
(4) Your Bank Details for the Transfer
(6) Your Means of Identification
Please, be informed that this Notification Message is genuine and not contrary to any breach of law . There is a committee set-up by the government of these countries to monitor this arrangement/payments to make sure that all approved beneficiaries like you receive their delayed payments from this bank.
Thanks
Ms. Gayla Henderson
National Bank of New York
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

subject: Re:   NATIONAL BANK OF NEW YORK.
body:
Hello Ms. Gayla Henderson,

Wow, this is such an unexpected surprise! I can't believe that President Joe Biden and other world leaders have been working on something like this. It's really amazing how they're helping people out.

I'm curious though, how did my name come up in this? And why was the money delayed or denied in the first place? Also, could you tell me more about the committee monitoring these payments? It sounds like a very important job.

Looking forward to your response!

P.S. I hope you don't mind me asking all these questions. I just find it all so fascinating!

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: URGENT RESPONSE
body:
*National Bank of New York*
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

Attention :

Sir,
 We are in receipt of your response message .
All internal documentations within this bank prior to the release of the
$10.5m to you are in progress.
All things being equal, the transfer of the funds to you shall be concluded
within the next 14 working days from the day you acknowledge the receipt of
this very message.
Following the wild restriction/interception predominant  on wire transfers
of amounts of high magnitude round the world now , This noble bank out of
past experience has decided to pay all beneficiaries STRICTLY via American
Express Platinum Credit Card and JetPrivilege World Credit Card to avoid
delays.
The production of the cards has commenced and as soon as the CARDS are
ready you will be informed and we shall discuss the best way to deliver the
cards to you and the Delivery date of the cards will be made known to you.
As investment bankers, it is our special responsibility to ensure not only
the safety of the deposit but its maturity with high interest yield, hence
the choice of Platinum Credit Card which attracts the highest yield of
interest in a short period of time. Out of this $10,500,000:00,
$7,000,000:00( Seven Million U.S Dollars) will be channeled to the American
Express Platinum Credit Card. And the remaining $3,500,000:00 (Three
million Five Hundred U.S Dollars will go into the most globally acceptable
Jetprivilege World Credit Card.
With both cards, you can buy houses, buy cars, pay your holiday bills
anywhere in the world without touching physical cash.
Acknowledge this message as quickly as possible and we shall update you on
the next step to conclude the transfer.
Meanwhile, provide me with your INFORMATION as requested in our first
message to you to enable us to conclude our internal logistics within this
bank prior to the release of your payment.

Thanks.

*Ms. Gayla Henderson*
National Bank of New York
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

subject: Re: URGENT RESPONSE
body:
Hello Ms. Gayla Henderson,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to learn about the process of transferring funds via American Express Platinum Credit Card and World Credit Card. I must say, it sounds very convenient and secure.

I'm curious though, how does the bank ensure the safety of these cards during delivery? And what happens if, God forbid, they get lost or stolen during transit?

Also, could you please elaborate a bit more on how the interest yield works with these cards? I'm not very familiar with financial terms but I'd love to understand better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: Re: Attention :Cara(National Bank of New York)
body:
Hello Ms. Gayla Henderson,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to learn about the process of transferring funds via American Express Platinum Credit Card and World Credit Card. I must say, it sounds very convenient and secure.

I'm curious though, how does the insurance of the package work? And what would be the estimated delivery cost? Also, could you please elaborate more on how these cards attract high yield of interest in a short period of time?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: Re: Attention :Cara(National Bank of New York)
body:
*National Bank of New York*
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

Attention : Cara ,

Sir,
Your response is received and appreciated.This is very genuine and
authentic and many have received their payments from us.
 *Please provide your ID, your FULL NAMES and the address where you will
want the cards to be delivered in your favor.*
The production of the cards is in progress ,you will be informed as soon as
the cards are ready.
Please, understand that, because of the worth of the cards our mode of
delivery to every beneficiary is via Special courier, the ENVOYS. It is
physical delivery to the address to avoid any loss in transit. The cards
are also going to be INSURED prior to delivery. We shall inform you on the
cost of Insurance and the delivery cost in our next communication after
your next response.
You will receive all the documents to substantiate the transfer along with
the cards
Stay tuned

Thanks.

*Ms. Gayla Henderson*
National Bank of New York
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

Thank you for your prompt response. It's really exciting to hear about these cards and the process involved in getting them delivered. I'm curious, how does the insurance work for these cards? And what kind of special courier service do you use?

I'd also like to know more about the documents that come along with the cards. What kind of information do they contain? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Cara

subject: CARDS READY AND TO BE DELIVERED TO YOUR ADDRESS.
body:
*National Bank of New York*
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

Attention : Cara ,


Sir,

Be informed that all your information provided has been vetted and it might
interest you to know that all your information submitted has been accepted
for the purpose of the delivery of the $10.5m by American Express Platinum
Credit Card  and a JetPrivilege World Credit Card  to your address.

*Please provide your ID, your FULL NAMES and the address where you will
want the cards to be delivered in your favor.*

Also be informed that the production of the cards is completed by the ATM
Department and ready for delivery to your address as contained in your
information provided to this bank..
We have also concluded our discussion with the Insurance company for the
Insurance Bond on the CARDS and the Envoys (Special courier)  for the
delivery of the cards to your address.
Note that the cost of the Insurance and the Delivery cost is $1050, and
this cost is the sole responsibility of the beneficiary.

The departure date of the cards has been scheduled for 17th Feb 2024
Saturday this week and the arrival date is 20th of Feb being Tuesday next
week too.

Your urgent attention to the payment of this fee is expected to enable the
dispatch of the cards accordingly.

We shall provide you with the bank account details where the $1050 should
be transferred into prior to the delivery of the parcel to you as soon as
you show readiness to transfer the above fee.


Thanks for allowing us to serve you better.


Thanks.

*Ms. Gayla Henderson*
National Bank of New York
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

subject: Re: CARDS READY AND TO BE DELIVERED TO YOUR ADDRESS.
body:
Hello Ms. Gayla Henderson,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's great to hear that the cards are ready for delivery. I'm really excited about this!

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind me asking. You mentioned an insurance bond on the cards and a delivery cost. Could you please explain more about what these are? Also, how does the payment process work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: RE: CARDS READY AND TO BE DELIVERED TO YOUR ADDRESS.
body:
*National Bank of New York*
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

Attention : Cara ,


Sir,
The fee is to INSURE THE PARCEL against any form of loss on transit is $650.
The delivery is by Envoys services and a physical delivery to your address,
the cost for the service is $400, bringing the total amount to $1050.
As soon as the above payment is made ,an irrevocable delivery of the parcel
containing the cards will be achieved.
*Please provide your ID, your FULL NAMES and the address where you will
want the cards to be delivered in your favor.*

Thanks.

*Ms. Gayla Henderson*

136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

subject: Re: RE: CARDS READY AND TO BE DELIVERED TO YOUR ADDRESS.
body:
Hello Ms. Gayla Henderson,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm quite excited about the delivery of the parcel! 

Just to clarify, could you please explain a bit more about this insurance fee? I'd like to understand how it works and what exactly it covers.

Also, could you provide some more details about Envoys services? I've never heard of them before and would love to know more about their delivery process.

As for my personal information, I'm sorry but I don't feel comfortable sharing it over email. Is there another way we can handle this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: RE:RE: CARDS READY AND TO BE DELIVERED TO YOUR ADDRESS.
body:
*National Bank of New York*
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.
USA.

Attention : Cara ,

Sir,
We cannot attend to any of your questions again until your information is
received as one of the prerequisites to receiving this payment.
Again, the receipt of this payment is by choice and not by force. You may
decide to decline and forfeit the payment if you are being skeptical about
the process.
The valid information  of the card comes with the parcel after you have
paid the associated fee, just like others who have received.

Thanks.

*Ms. Gayla Henderson*
National Bank of New York
136-29 38th Avenue,
Flushing, NY 11354.

subject: Re: RE:RE: CARDS READY AND TO BE DELIVERED TO YOUR ADDRESS.
body:
Hello Ms. Gayla Henderson,

Thank you for your response. I'm a bit confused about the process you mentioned. Could you please explain it to me in simpler terms? Also, could you clarify what this associated fee is for and how much it would be?

I'm really interested in understanding more about this payment and the card that comes with the parcel. You mentioned others have received it - could you tell me more about their experiences?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Cara
